Token.Abstract: The delegate of a SmartAdServerView object must adopt the SmartAdServerViewDelegate protocol.
Tells the delegate that the ad data has been fetched, and will try to display it

Parameter.Name: adView
Parameter.Abstract: The ad view informing the delegate about the ad beeing fetched

Parameter.Name: adInfo
Parameter.Abstract: is a copy of the SmartAdServerAd object

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the creative from the current ad has been loaded and displayed

Parameter.Name: adView
Parameter.Abstract: An ad view object informing the delegate about the creative beeing loaded

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the SmartAdServerView failed to download the ad

Parameter.Name: adView
Parameter.Abstract: An ad view object informing the delegate about the failure

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the SmartAdServerView which displayed an expandable ad did collapse

Parameter.Name: adView
Parameter.Abstract: An ad view object informing the delegate that it did collapse

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the SmartAdServerView has been dismissed

Parameter.Name: adView
Parameter.Abstract: The ad view informing the delegate that it was dismissed

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that a modal view will appear to display the ad's redirect URL web page if appropriate

Parameter.Name: adView
Parameter.Abstract: An ad view object informing the delegate about the modal view going to open

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the modal view will be dismissed

Parameter.Name: adView
Parameter.Abstract: An ad view object informing the delegate about the modal view going to open

Token.Abstract: Asks the delegate for a View Controller to manage the modal view that displays the redirect URL

Parameter.Name: smartAdServerView
Parameter.Abstract: An ad view object asking the delegate for a View Controller

ReturnValue.Abstract: : A View Controller able to manage the modal view

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that an ad action has been made (for example, the user tapped the ad)

Parameter.Name: adView
Parameter.Abstract: An ad view object informing the delegate about the ad beeing clicked

Parameter.Name: willExit
Parameter.Abstract: whether the user chose to leave the app.

Token.Abstract: Asks the delegate whether to execute ad action

Parameter.Name: URL
Parameter.Abstract: The url that will be called

ReturnValue.Abstract: whether the Smart AdServer SDK should handle the URL

Token.Abstract: Deprecated Tells the delegate that the ad or the portrait creative or the landscape creative failed to download and asks for another ad to display

Parameter.Name: smartAdServerView
Parameter.Abstract: An ad view object asking the delegate for another ad to display in case of failure

ReturnValue.Abstract: A SmartAdServerAd object to display, or nil if you don't want to display your own advertisement

Token.Abstract: Deprecated Tells the delegate that the ad or the portrait creative or the landscape creative did download

Parameter.Name: smartAdServerView
Parameter.Abstract: An ad view object telling the delegate that something was downloaded

Token.Abstract: Deprecated Tells the delegate that the ad view did collapse

Parameter.Name: smartAdServerView
Parameter.Abstract: An ad view object telling the delegate that it collapsed

Token.Abstract: Deprecated Tells the delegate that the ad disappeared

Parameter.Name: smartAdServerView
Parameter.Abstract: An ad view object telling the delegate that it disappeared
